en.title: INE eJPT Certified
en.text: Earned the eJPT certification, demonstrating foundational skills in ethical hacking and vulnerability assessment.

en.text: Developed multiple cybersecurity tools and projects, including Anubis and LLM Security Sandbox.

en.text: Explored California, engaging with local cybersecurity communities and attending industry events.

en.text: Successfully passed the eWPT certification, validating advanced skills in web penetration testing.

en.title: Developed Love for LLM Attacks
en.text: Built an LLM Security Sandbox to test AI model vulnerabilities and prompt injection exploits.
